column2:
Use this decision to mark rulers who are:
* §YLonely§! (the only count+ ruler of their dynasty)
* §YTiny§! (controls only one county)

Then, type searches into the §GCharacter finder§! such as:
* §Ytiny lonely§! to find a challenging starting character
* §Ytiny [From.GetOnlyDynastyName]§! to find a new dynast to play when your character dies.

The following §GConsole commands§! may be useful for switching characters:
* §Ycharinfo§!: Show numeric character IDs in tooltips
* §Yplay 12345§!: Play as this character
* §Yenable_ambition 12345§!: Undo AI choice of ambition
* §Yclr_focus§!: Undo AI choice of focus
* §Yobserve§!: Let the AI play for a generation

column1: # * §Yfow§!: Turn "fog of war" back on after leaving observe mode

column2: The only count+ ruler of their dynasty
